name: Voice
message: Jonathan Swift.

name: Voice
message: Your tricks to use women...

name: Voice
message: Fine. Watch closely,
I was standing in the falling snow.

The one walking in front of me seems to be a woman, judging by her build. From head to toe, she's wrapped tightly in a shabby cloak, not even a puff of white breath escaping. Next to her, someone with the height of a girl is following along like a servant.

A thin layer of snow had piled up on the donkey's load, which was surprisingly light. Even so, the beast's gait was unsteady. But the woman didn't mind at all and kept pulling the reins straight ahead.
On top of the hills ahead, there was a pretty large stone building, and these two were probably heading there.

They're way too unnatural to be parent and child. The older woman glances back at the girl following her from time to time, but she doesn't seem to have any intention of matching her pace to the girl struggling through the deep snow.

If the girl had reins attached to her nose, I feel like I'd pull her along without hesitation. That phrase that just popped into my head—'like a servant'—might have accidentally hit the nail on the head.

name: Maria
message: Yeah, I did see the letter from the Cardinal.
Seems like we don't have any reason to turn you two away.
It looks like I'm inside the huge stone building I saw earlier in the snow. Through the window behind the woman, I can still see the snow falling.
The woman is dressed as a nun. If that's the case, then this must be the Monastery.

name: Maria
message: Even so......

name: Maria
message: Lushion, how many years has it been since I last saw you？
When we first met, you were just about the same age as that girl.

name: Lushion
message: That's right, Sister Maria.
To be the head of the Monastery at such a young age, that's really impressive.

name: Maria
message: Was that supposed to be sarcasm？
It's true, I didn't have the qualities of an academic seeker.

name: Maria
message: But maybe that was just right for me.
I'm satisfied with my current position.

name: Lushion
message: I didn't mean to be sarcastic.
If　that's　how　it　came　across,　then　I　apologize.

name: Maria
message: That's enough already.
More importantly, what business do you have at this Monastery...

name: Lushion
message: 『What do you want?'—what does that mean?
Everything is left up to you.
You must be thinking that we should devote ourselves to faith in this institution.

name: Maria
message: Stop playing dumb.
Do you really think I don't know what kind of work you do under the Cardinal？

name: Maria
message: I'm aware that you're working as a spy for the Cardinal. As the spearhead of the internal audit, you'll investigate the immoral acts happening in the institution and report the facts.

name: Maria
message: But, there's no such thing at this monastery at all.
Why did you set your sights on the Miskatonic Monastery?

name: Lushion
message: It seems like you might be misunderstanding something.
We're　just　humble　nuns　who　serve　God,　nothing　more.

name: Maria
message: You still hate me, don't you......

name: Maria
message: That might be only natural.
If only I had closed my eyes back then......

name: Maria
message: You wouldn't have just ended up as an ordinary nun, would you?
You were even expected to become the first female cardinal, after all.

name: Maria
message: But I couldn't just overlook your mistake.
貴女の将来を台無しにしてしまった。

name: Maria
message: Back then, you......

name: Lushion
message: シスター・マリア！

name: Maria
message: I'm sorry.........

name: Lushion
message: This girl is Sarah, for whom I am the guardian.
She's a smart kid for her age, and I brought her along because I want to show her around here and there while she's still young.

name: Lushion
message: Well then, we'll be in your care for a while.

name: Maria
message: Life here might be hard for you, you know, in this institution......

name: Angelica
message: 相変わらず心配性ね、マリア。
What do you expect me to do now, after all this time?

name: Maria
message: Angelica......
I'm　talking　to　you　two　right　now.

name: Angelica
message: 久しぶりねリュション、もう何年ぶりかしら？

name: Maria
message: Angelica, please, I'm begging you, stop it...

name: Angelica
message: Shut up, I'm not gonna do anything to you or anything.
It's just, I was feeling a bit nostalgic.

name: Angelica
message: What's wrong？
You say you don't even want to look at my face.

name: Angelica
message: Well, whatever.

name: Angelica
message: We'll get to see each other every day from now on, right?
It's nice to have some change in the boring life at the monastery.

name: Lushion
message: Nice to meet you, Sister Angelica.

name: Maria
message: Angelica, do you understand what kind of position these two people have？

name: Maria
message: These two are the Cardinal's‥‥‥‥

name: Angelica
message: Oh my, did you really say that yourself？
No, that's not it.

name: Lushion
message: Yeah, that's a misunderstanding on Sister Maria's part.

name: Angelica
message: I thought so.

name: Maria
message: That's enough, I've had more than enough of this...

name: Maria
message: I'll have someone show you to your room.
You're　probably　tired　today,　so　there's　no　need　for　you　to　attend　mass.

name: Angelica
message: See you, Lushion.
Let's meet again tomorrow, okay?
It's a shabby stone-built room. The faint light of a candle softly illuminates the interior.
Sitting on the bed and talking are Lushion and Sarah from earlier. Since they've taken off their hoods, they look a bit more human.

name: Sarah
message: Do you really think something is happening in this monastery？
It really doesn't look that way to me.

name: Lushion
message: We haven't seen anything yet.
Stop trying to jump to conclusions so quickly.

name: Sarah
message: Yes, Lushion-sama.

name: Lushion
message: Even so...
I　can't　believe　Angelica　is　at　the　Miskatonic　Monastery.

name: Sarah
message: Do you know her？
It seemed like she really hated you, Lushion-sama...

name: Lushion
message: Yeah, I suppose so.
From her perspective, I can't really blame her.

name: Sarah
message: Did... something happen？

name: Lushion
message: Sarah, stop asking foolish questions.

name: Sarah
message: Yes... I'm sorry.

name: Lushion
message: Anyway, there's no doubt that something is happening in this convent.

name: Lushion
message: Dozens of nuns have disappeared in just a single year, and it seems like the convent doesn't want that to be made public...

name: Lushion
message: Sarah, you should go to sleep now.
You've had a long day, right？

name: Sarah
message: Yes... but... I...

name: Lushion
message: ...Yeah, well then, let's offer our evening prayers,
and have a good rest tonight.

name: Lushion
message: I really doubt anything will happen on the very night we arrived.

name: Sarah
message: ...Our Father, who art in heaven...

name: Sarah
message: ...Lead us not into temptation...

name: Sarah
message: ...But deliver us from evil...

name: Lushion
message: (…Just what on earth is going on…)
